snippet.title: Parcel Master - Trailer
snippet.description:
Parcel Master Demo is now available on:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3192960/Parcel_Master/

In Parcel Master, you're the brains behind the city's ever-expanding delivery network. Direct a growing fleet of trucks to pick up and drop off an increasing number of parcels, but beware: every street can only be used once!

Plan your routes carefully, navigate tricky intersections, and optimize your fleet to keep up with the demand. With 100 puzzles of increasing complexity, Parcel Master will challenge your logic and strategic thinking to the limit.

Features:
- 100 mind-bending puzzles: From easy deliveries to mind-boggling logistical nightmares, there's a challenge for everyone.
- Simple to learn, hard to master: Intuitive controls make it easy to pick up and play, but mastering the art of delivery takes true skill.
- Minimalist aesthetic: Clean visuals and a relaxing soundtrack let you focus on the puzzles at hand.
- Hours of addictive gameplay: Can you conquer every challenge and become the ultimate Parcel Master?

Hit the road and put your delivery skills to the test!
